com.artemis.injection

Interface Injector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CachedInjector

    public interface Injector

    API used by World to inject objects annotated with Wire with dependencies. An injector injects ComponentMapper, BaseSystem and .Manager types into systems and managers.

    To inject arbitrary types, use registered through WorldConfiguration.register(java.lang.Object).

    To customize the injection-strategy for arbitrary types further, registered a custom FieldHandler with custom one or more FieldResolver.

    Author:
    Snorre E. Brekke
    See Also:
    FieldHandler

    • Method Detail

      • getRegistered

        <T> T getRegistered(String id)
        Programmatic retrieval of registered objects. Useful when full injection isn't necessary.
        Parameters:
        id - Name or class name.
        Returns:
        the requested object, or null if not found
        See Also:
        WorldConfiguration.register(String, Object)

      • getRegistered

        <T> T getRegistered(Class<T> id)
        Programmatic retrieval of registered objects. Useful when full injection isn't necessary. This method internally calls getRegistered(String), with the class name as parameter.
        Parameters:
        id - Uniquely registered instance, identified by class..
        Returns:
        the requested object, or null if not found
        See Also:
        WorldConfiguration.register(Object)

      • initialize

        void initialize(World world,
              Map<String,Object> injectables)
        Parameters:
        world - this Injector will be used for
        injectables - registered via WorldConfiguration.register(java.lang.Object)
        Throws:
        InjectionException - when injector lacks a means to inject injectables.

      • inject

        void inject(Object target)
            throws RuntimeException
        Inject dependencies on object. The injector delegates to FieldHandler to resolve feiled values.
        Parameters:
        target - object which should have dependencies injected.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException
        See Also:
        FieldHandler

      • isInjectable

        boolean isInjectable(Object target)
        Determins if a target object can be injected by this injector.
        Parameters:
        target - eligable for injection
        Returns:
        true if the Injector is capable of injecting the target object.

      • setFieldHandler

        Injector setFieldHandler(FieldHandler fieldHandler)
        Enables the injector to be configured with a custom FieldHandler which will be used to resolve instance values for target-fields.
        Parameters:
        fieldHandler - to use for resolving dependency values
        Returns:
        this Injector for chaining
